name: Chital Bowl L
description: The Chital Bowl with its amorphous shape is both beautiful and functional. Available in 3 other sizes and different finishes. Handmade, featuring Shagreen & Bronze-Patina Brass. Wipe clean with soft dry cloth. Made in Philippines. Kifu uses handmade techniques of elaborate inlay patterns of shagreen, shells, semi-precious stones, reflecting her unique approach.
